translations: 身兼数职；成为复数（同 pluralize）

sentences.sentence: The rule is that you pluralise the "head" of the term.
sentences.translation: 名词词组复数变化的规则就是：变“重点词”。

sentences.sentence: But English is pretty simple: verbs hardly conjugate; nouns pluralise easily (just add "s", mostly) and there are no genders to remember.
sentences.translation: 但英语其实很简单：基本没有动词变位，名词变复数很容易(大多数情况下只用加字母“s”)，而且无需记忆词性。
